title: From where do you get your certainty? - Quora

response.answer_text: Survival. Many times. Over and over again. And again. And that begins with messing up a lot in the first place (and over again) and being born into a hard family to be born into. Survival and the ability to not fear in the presence of people or situations that make others fear. And the desire to experience. I forgot that. Curiosity rules over everything. Once you figure one thing out, the next one falls at your feet, eventually, and so on.
